author: cnbc.com
title: TCF Declares Quarterly Cash Dividends
text:
WAYZATA, Minn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of TCF Financial Corporation (TCF) (NYSE: TCF) today declared quarterly cash dividends on TCFâ€™s common shares and 5.70% Series C Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock.
A quarterly cash dividend of $0.15 per common share is payable on June 1, 2018 to stockholders of record at the close of business on May 15, 2018. At March 31, 2018, there were 169.4 million common shares outstanding listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol TCF.
A quarterly cash dividend of $0.35625 per depositary share is payable on June 1, 2018 to stockholders of record of the depositary shares, representing a 1/1,000 th interest in a share of the 5.70% Series C Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, at the close of business on May 15, 2018.
About TCF
TCF is a Wayzata, Minnesota-based national bank holding company. As of December 31, 2017, TCF had $23.0 billion in total assets and 320 bank branches in Illinois, Minnesota, Michigan, Colorado, Wisconsin, Arizona and South Dakota providing retail and commercial banking services. TCF, through its subsidiaries, also conducts commercial leasing and equipment finance business in all 50 states and commercial inventory finance business in all 50 states and Canada. For more information about TCF, please visit http://ir.tcfbank.com .
